snippet: Sprint Nextel on Thursday offered about $2.1 billion for the portion of Clearwire it did not already own, moving to secure access to a big chunk of spectrum.
abstract: Sprint Nextel on Thursday offered about $2.1 billion for the portion of Clearwire it did not already own, moving to secure access to a big chunk of spectrum.
lead_paragraph: Sprint Nextel on Thursday offered about $2.1 billion for the portion of Clearwire it did not already own, moving to secure access to a big chunk of spectrum.Read more »

headline.main: Sprint Offers to Buy Remaining Stake in Clearwire for $2.1 Billion
